item.title: Comment on Thursday assorted links by Marcel
item.description:
1. You could easily make one of those IQ bell curve memes about the Middle East where the 80 IQ guy is saying "the Middle East is violent because they all hate each other", the 100 IQ guy is on some long ramble about how there is a complex pattern of religious and ethnic identities and alliances and centuries of history that you need to understand to analyze the region properly, and the 180 IQ guy is saying "the Middle East is violent because they all hate each other"

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/10/thursday-assorted-links-472.html?commentID=160821396
